p: Among 402 collected cloacal and tracheal swab samples in two markets, there are 200 swab samples in chicken and 202 swab samples in duck. Among 200 samples in chicken, 144 samples were collected in the Khe Sanh market (72.0%). Among 202 samples in duck, 142 samples were collected in the Khe Sanh bordering market (70.3%).
